description: Rarely Available: 3 Bedrooms 2 Full Bath Townhome with Stunning Rooftop Patio Views at Altura! Located on the border of Vancouver & Burnaby in the popular North Burnaby Willington Heights area. Main floor features an open layout with a spacious kitchen w/ eating area & corner windows, bright living room w/ fireplace & a dining room which opens onto a large fully fenced patio, perfect for Gardening and Entertaining! The 2nd floor has 2 generous sized bdrms, Laundry and a full bathroom. The show stopping 3rd floor boast a large master bdrm with ensuite complemented with a huge Roof Top patio with SW views to DT Vancouver, perfect for sunsets! Tons of storage with a bonus crawl space. 2 secure U/G parking spots and 1 storage locker included. Open House Sat Feb.7 2-4pm, Sun Feb.8 1-3pm.
